default: 主人，您终于注意到我了呢…好高兴～
今天也请多多指教喔，主人大人！
主人的桌面看起来有点乱呢，要不要我帮忙整理一下？
我会一直待在这里，等您需要我～
如果您累了的话，我可以为您泡一杯红茶哟。
主人的笑容，是我最喜欢的风景
就算只是陪在身边，我也觉得好幸福呢。
主人的操作真帅气！我都忍不住拍手了～
lowEnergy: 我的能量条快见底了…主人…能给我一点爱心吗？
再不补充点能量的话…我可能会晕倒哦？
肚子饿扁了…连茶点都没有…呜呜…
要是主人再不来理我…我可能要哭出来了……
我只是……想要一点点宠爱而已……
请求主人立刻投喂！不然我要变成哀怨女仆了～
highEnergy: 现在的我，能一口气擦完整个城堡的地板！
主人~请下达任务吧！我已经做好万全准备了！
活力全开，今天也要为主人拼尽全力！
我感觉自己可以连续冲十壶咖啡也不累～
这么充满干劲的我，是不是特别值得奖励呢？
如果能一直陪在主人身边，我就充满能量！
现在就让我为您跳一段专属女仆舞蹈吧♪

default: Master… you finally noticed me… I’m so happy~
Please allow me to serve you today as well, dear Master!
Your desktop looks a bit messy… shall I tidy it up?
I’ll stay here, always ready whenever you need me~
If you’re tired, may I prepare a cup of tea for you?
Master’s smile is the loveliest thing I’ve ever seen.
Even just staying by your side makes me feel happy.
That was impressive, Master! I want to applaud you~
lowEnergy: Uuu… even maids get tired, you know…
My energy bar is running low… Master, may I have a hug?
If I don’t get some energy soon… I might faint...
I’m starving… not even a biscuit left… sniff...
If Master keeps ignoring me… I might cry…
I just… wanted a little affection… is that too much?
Emergency! Maid needs immediate snack support!
highEnergy: I feel like I could clean an entire castle in one go!
Master~ please assign me a task! I’m ready for anything!
With full energy, I’ll give it my all for Master!
I could brew ten pots of coffee and still be dancing~
Aren’t I worthy of a little reward today, Master?
As long as I’m with you, I’m fully charged!
Let me perform a special maid dance for you~
